channel.title: I need a hoster
channel.description:
Hey guys,
Im really struggling to keep the server online for even 3 - 4 hours per day and its a popular server "battlescape2000" and users really hate when its offline so im looking for someone who has hosted servers before, that will be able to host this server.
Be careful: if you are already hosting a server, that you know how to host 2.. using different ports etc.
Thanks.
Tell me your msn and i will add you?
Thanks.

item.title: I need a hoster
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

We don’t ask for hosters here.

Read full topic

item.title: I need a hoster
item.dc:creator: @Thickertech Thickertech
item.description:
@Thickertech wrote:

yes this is the wrong section but you dont have to tell himto gtfo he might have not read the rule, even though he should you dont just demand that he reads the rules just tell him.

And yes please can a mod lock this.

Read full topic
